attributes.additional_details: So that every women can access sanitary products no matter if you can afford it or not. Cause if you don’t use them it can be very damaging to women’s bodies.
attributes.background: Women’s sanitary products (tampons, pads etc) currently cost quite a lot of money and some people can not afford them, the government should make them free to get anywhere.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643551
